column2: # SizeLimit = indicates if a size limit is in place
# PortLc = location of the port of entry (x,y)
# season = months in which fishing is allowed (no season == seq(0,11) )
# TimeHor = time horizon for evaluation of policy
# Fishers = number of fishers in the fishery
# maxCapac = max capcity of a single fisherman in a time step (kg) (can also be used as a triplimit or permit regulation tool)
